resources.string: When enabled, Phone Finder listens for the key phrase \"Phone Where Are You?\". Once Phone Finder hears this phrase, your android device emits a beeping noise and vibrates. Phone Finder listens all the time, no matter the state of the phone. The service can be disabled within the app. Make sure you speak loudly and clearly. The app does work offline, but the accuracy of the listener decreases. Phone Finder is limited to a certain radius and may not work when phone is far away. Other music media will not work while Phone Finder is on. Long periods of usage is not suggested due to battery drain.
